description: Returns information about a list of specified workgroups.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, make the call again using the returned token.

nested_items.name: workgroups
nested_items.description: The returned array of workgroups.

nested_items.name: baseCapacity
nested_items.description: The base data warehouse capacity of the workgroup in Redshift Processing Units (RPUs).

nested_items.name: configParameters
nested_items.description: An array of parameters to set for advanced control over a database. The options are auto_mv, datestyle, enable_case_sensitive_identifier, enable_user_activity_logging, query_group, search_path, require_ssl, use_fips_ssl, and query monitoring metrics that let you define performance boundaries. For more information about query monitoring rules and available metrics, see Query monitoring metrics for Amazon Redshift Serverless.

nested_items.name: parameterKey
nested_items.description: The key of the parameter. The options are auto_mv, datestyle, enable_case_sensitive_identifier, enable_user_activity_logging, query_group, search_path, require_ssl, use_fips_ssl, and query monitoring metrics that let you define performance boundaries. For more information about query monitoring rules and available metrics, see Query monitoring metrics for Amazon Redshift Serverless.

nested_items.name: parameterValue
nested_items.description: The value of the parameter to set.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the workgroup.

nested_items.name: crossAccountVpcs
nested_items.description: A list of VPCs. Each entry is the unique identifier of a virtual private cloud with access to Amazon Redshift Serverless. If all of the VPCs for the grantee are allowed, it shows an asterisk.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: customDomainCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The custom domain name's certificate Amazon resource name (ARN).

nested_items.name: customDomainCertificateExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The expiration time for the certificate.

nested_items.name: customDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name associated with the workgroup.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The DNS address of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port that Amazon Redshift Serverless listens on.

nested_items.name: vpcEndpoints
nested_items.description: An array of VpcEndpoint objects.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaces
nested_items.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability Zone.

nested_items.name: ipv6Address
nested_items.description: The IPv6 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the network interface.

nested_items.name: privateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.

nested_items.name: subnetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the subnet.

nested_items.name: vpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting to Amazon Redshift Serverless.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: enhancedVpcRouting
nested_items.description: The value that specifies whether to enable enhanced virtual private cloud (VPC) routing, which forces Amazon Redshift Serverless to route traffic through your VPC.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type that the workgroup supports. Possible values are ipv4 and dualstack.

nested_items.name: maxCapacity
nested_items.description: The maximum data-warehouse capacity Amazon Redshift Serverless uses to serve queries. The max capacity is specified in RPUs.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The namespace the workgroup is associated with.

nested_items.name: patchVersion
nested_items.description: The patch version of your Amazon Redshift Serverless workgroup. For more information about patch versions, see Cluster versions for Amazon Redshift.

nested_items.name: pendingTrackName
nested_items.description: The name for the track that you want to assign to the workgroup. When the track changes, the workgroup is switched to the latest workgroup release available for the track. At this point, the track name is applied.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The custom port to use when connecting to a workgroup. Valid port ranges are 5431-5455 and 8191-8215. The default is 5439.

nested_items.name: pricePerformanceTarget
nested_items.description: An object that represents the price performance target settings for the workgroup.

nested_items.name: level
nested_items.description: The target price performance level for the workgroup. Valid values include 1, 25, 50, 75, and 100. These correspond to the price performance levels LOW_COST, ECONOMICAL, BALANCED, RESOURCEFUL, and HIGH_PERFORMANCE.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Whether the price performance target is enabled for the workgroup.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessible
nested_items.description: A value that specifies whether the workgroup can be accessible from a public network.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of security group IDs to associate with the workgroup.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the workgroup.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of subnet IDs the workgroup is associated with.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: trackName
nested_items.description: The name of the track for the workgroup.

nested_items.name: workgroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that links to the workgroup.

nested_items.name: workgroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the workgroup.

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup.

nested_items.name: workgroupVersion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift Serverless version of your workgroup. For more information about Amazon Redshift Serverless versions, see Cluster versions for Amazon Redshift.
